review_blob: Great flavor and aroma.  Nice use of pumpkin and spices.  However, i feel that it should have a little more body to be imperial.
A great barley wine that packs a powerful punch.  Full bodied with fruity sweet flavors.  Relax and enjoy this beer nice and slowly.
The Hop Devil is one of my favorites.  With an unbelievable hoppy aroma, It has a great flavor and almost creamy body. A great ipa for the summer but enjoyable anytime for a hop fan.
Yet another great summer Ale.  Smooth and crisp with a robust hop pallete..  Comparable to Victory Hop Devil and Weyerbacher Hops Infusion.  A must try for a hop fan
Hoppy and malty with a great aroma.  This IPA is crisp and delicious, a great choice for the summer.  Comparable to the Victory Hop Devil.
